verses.esv: 14 but Jesus said, “Let the little children come to me and do not hinder them, for to such belongs the kingdom of heaven.”
verses.kjv: 14 But Jesus said, Suffer little children, and forbid them not, to come unto me: for of such is the kingdom of heaven.
verses.niv: 14 Jesus said, "Let the little children come to me, and do not hinder them, for the kingdom of heaven belongs to such as these."

verses.esv: 14 Here for the third time I am ready to come to you. And I will not be a burden, for I seek not what is yours but you. For children are not obligated to save up for their parents, but parents for their children.
verses.kjv: 14 Behold, the third time I am ready to come to you; and I will not be burdensome to you: for I seek not yours, but you: for the children ought not to lay up for the parents, but the parents for the children.
verses.niv: 14 Now I am ready to visit you for the third time, and I will not be a burden to you, because what I want is not your possessions but you. After all, children should not have to save up for their parents, but parents for their children.

verses.esv: 21 When a woman is giving birth, she has sorrow because her hour has come, but when she has delivered the baby, she no longer remembers the anguish, for joy that a human being has been born into the world.
verses.kjv: 21 A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow, because her hour is come: but as soon as she is delivered of the child, she remembereth no more the anguish, for joy that a man is born into the world.
verses.niv: 21 A woman giving birth to a child has pain because her time has come; but when her baby is born she forgets the anguish because of her joy that a child is born into the world.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.

verses.esv:
10   fear not, for I am with you;
    be not dismayed, for I am your God;
  I will strengthen you, I will help you,
    I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
verses.kjv: 10 Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
verses.niv: 10 So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

verses.esv: 23 Whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord and not for men,
verses.kjv: 23 And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;
verses.niv: 23 Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for men,

verses.esv: 15 Now they were bringing even infants to him that he might touch them. And when the disciples saw it, they rebuked them. 16 But Jesus called them to him, saying, “Let the children come to me, and do not hinder them, for to such belongs the kingdom of God. 17 Truly, I say to you, whoever does not receive the kingdom of God like a child shall not enter it.”
verses.kjv: 15 And they brought unto him also infants, that he would touch them: but when his disciples saw it, they rebuked them. 16 But Jesus called them unto him, and said, Suffer little children to come unto me, and forbid them not: for of such is the kingdom of God. 17 Verily I say unto you, Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein.
verses.niv: 15 People were also bringing babies to Jesus to have him touch them. When the disciples saw this, they rebuked them. 16 But Jesus called the children to him and said, "Let the little children come to me, and do not hinder them, for the kingdom of God belongs to such as these. 17 I tell you the truth, anyone who will not receive the kingdom of God like a little child will never enter it."

verses.esv: 28 Let the thief no longer steal, but rather let him labor, doing honest work with his own hands, so that he may have something to share with anyone in need.
verses.kjv: 28 Let him that stole steal no more: but rather let him labour, working with his hands the thing which is good, that he may have to give to him that needeth.
verses.niv: 28 He who has been stealing must steal no longer, but must work, doing something useful with his own hands, that he may have something to share with those in need.

verses.esv: 12 she was told, “The older will serve the younger.”
verses.kjv: 12 It was said unto her, The elder shall serve the younger.
verses.niv: 12 not by works but by him who calls--she was told, "The older will serve the younger."

verses.esv:
16 To the woman he said,

  “I will surely multiply your pain in childbearing;
    in pain you shall bring forth children.
  Your desire shall be contrary to your husband,
    but he shall rule over you.”
verses.kjv: 16 Unto the woman he said, I will greatly multiply thy sorrow and thy conception; in sorrow thou shalt bring forth children; and thy desire shall be to thy husband, and he shall rule over thee.
verses.niv: 16 To the woman he said, "I will greatly increase your pains in childbearing; with pain you will give birth to children. Your desire will be for your husband, and he will rule over you."

verses.esv:
6   Train up a child in the way he should go;
    even when he is old he will not depart from it.
verses.kjv: 6 Train up a child in the way he should go: and when he is old, he will not depart from it.
verses.niv: 6 Train a child in the way he should go, and when he is old he will not turn from it.

verses.esv: 35 In all things I have shown you that by working hard in this way we must help the weak and remember the words of the Lord Jesus, how he himself said, ‘It is more blessed to give than to receive.’”
verses.kjv: 35 I have shewed you all things, how that so labouring ye ought to support the weak, and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus, how he said, It is more blessed to give than to receive.
verses.niv: 35 In everything I did, I showed you that by this kind of hard work we must help the weak, remembering the words the Lord Jesus himself said: 'It is more blessed to give than to receive.'"

verses.esv: 28 Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
verses.kjv: 28 Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
verses.niv: 28 "Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.

verses.esv: 16 In the same way, let your light shine before others, so that they may see your good works and give glory to your Father who is in heaven.
verses.kjv: 16 Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.
verses.niv: 16 In the same way, let your light shine before men, that they may see your good deeds and praise your Father in heaven.

verses.esv:
11   Rescue those who are being taken away to death;
    hold back those who are stumbling to the slaughter.
verses.kjv: 11 If thou forbear to deliver them that are drawn unto death, and those that are ready to be slain;
verses.niv: 11 Rescue those being led away to death; hold back those staggering toward slaughter.

verses.esv: 11 and to aspire to live quietly, and to mind your own affairs, and to work with your hands, as we instructed you,
verses.kjv: 11 And that ye study to be quiet, and to do your own business, and to work with your own hands, as we commanded you;
verses.niv: 11 Make it your ambition to lead a quiet life, to mind your own business and to work with your hands, just as we told you,

verses.esv:
23   In all toil there is profit,
    but mere talk tends only to poverty.
verses.kjv: 23 In all labour there is profit: but the talk of the lips tendeth only to penury.
verses.niv: 23 All hard work brings a profit, but mere talk leads only to poverty.

verses.esv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
verses.kjv: 27 Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
verses.niv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.

verses.esv: 7 casting all your anxieties on him, because he cares for you.
verses.kjv: 7 Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
verses.niv: 7 Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.

verses.esv: 28 And God blessed them. And God said to them, “Be fruitful and multiply and fill the earth and subdue it, and have dominion over the fish of the sea and over the birds of the heavens and over every living thing that moves on the earth.”
verses.kjv: 28 And God blessed them, and God said unto them, Be fruitful, and multiply, and replenish the earth, and subdue it: and have dominion over the fish of the sea, and over the fowl of the air, and over every living thing that moveth upon the earth.
verses.niv: 28 God blessed them and said to them, "Be fruitful and increase in number; fill the earth and subdue it. Rule over the fish of the sea and the birds of the air and over every living creature that moves on the ground."

verses.esv:
3   Behold, children are a heritage from the LORD,
    the fruit of the womb a reward.
verses.kjv: 3 Lo, children are an heritage of the LORD: and the fruit of the womb is his reward.
verses.niv: 3 Sons are a heritage from the LORD, children a reward from him.

verses.esv:
11   Whoever works his land will have plenty of bread,
    but he who follows worthless pursuits lacks sense.
verses.kjv: 11 He that tilleth his land shall be satisfied with bread: but he that followeth vain persons is void of understanding.
verses.niv: 11 He who works his land will have abundant food, but he who chases fantasies lacks judgment.

verses.esv:
22   Cast your burden on the LORD,
    and he will sustain you;
  he will never permit
    the righteous to be moved.
verses.kjv: 22 Cast thy burden upon the LORD, and he shall sustain thee: he shall never suffer the righteous to be moved.
verses.niv: 22 Cast your cares on the LORD and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous fall.

verses.esv:
3   You keep him in perfect peace
    whose mind is stayed on you,
    because he trusts in you.
verses.kjv: 3 Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.
verses.niv: 3 You will keep in perfect peace him whose mind is steadfast, because he trusts in you.

verses.esv: 27 Do not work for the food that perishes, but for the food that endures to eternal life, which the Son of Man will give to you. For on him God the Father has set his seal.”
verses.kjv: 27 Labour not for the meat which perisheth, but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life, which the Son of man shall give unto you: for him hath God the Father sealed.
verses.niv: 27 Do not work for food that spoils, but for food that endures to eternal life, which the Son of Man will give you. On him God the Father has placed his seal of approval."
